PUBLICATION

• All accepted, paid, and presented papers from iCMS2025 will be considered for publication in one of the following journals, matching their respective scopes.

Publication Opportunities:

WoS/SCOPUS

  • Romanian Statistical Review (WoS / SCOPUS (Q4)) https://www.revistadestatistica.ro/
  • Austrian Journal of Statistics (SCOPUS (Q4) / WoS) https://www.ajs.or.at/index.php/ajs/index
  • Educational Media International (EMI) (SCOPUS (Q2))https://www.tandfonline.com/journals/remi20
  • Journal of Information and Communication Technology (JICT) (WoS / SCOPUS (Q4)) - RM 1000 https://e-journal.uum.edu.my/index.php/jict
  • MATEMATIKA: Malaysian Journal of Industrial and Applied Mathematics (WoS (Q4)) - RM 300 https://matematika.utm.my/index.php/matematika

MyCITE

  • Journal of Applied Mathematics and Computational Intelligence (AMCI)* https://ejournal.unimap.edu.my/index.php/amci
  • Journal of Creative Practices in Language Learning and Teaching (CPLT)* https://cplt.uitm.edu.my/v1/
  • Voice of Academia (VoA)* https://voa.uitm.edu.my/v1/
  • International Journal of Innovation and Industrial Revolution (IJIREV)- RM 200 https://ijirev.com/
  • International Journal of Education,Psychology and Counseling (IJEPC) - RM 200 https://www.ijepc.com/

Semarak Ilmu Journals and Publication Fees

IMPORTANT NOTE: Required to have at least one (1) international author.

SCOPUS Journals

No. Journal Name Fee
1 CFD Letters (Q3) RM2000 (International Corresponding Author) or RM1500 (Malaysian Corresponding Author)
2 Journal of Advanced Research in Applied Mechanics RM2000 (International Corresponding Author) or RM1500 (Malaysian Corresponding Author)
3 Journal of Advanced Research in Fluid Mechanics and Thermal Sciences (Q3) RM2000 (International Corresponding Author) or RM1500 (Malaysian Corresponding Author)
4 Journal of Advanced Research in Micro and Nano Engineering RM2500 (International Corresponding Author) or RM2000 (Malaysian Corresponding Author)
5 Journal of Advanced Research in Numerical Heat Transfer (Q1) RM2500 (International Corresponding Author) or RM2000 (Malaysian Corresponding Author)



MYCITE Journals

No. Journal Name Fee
1 International Journal of Advanced Research in Future Ready Learning and Education RM250 (Malaysian Corresponding Author)
2 Journal of Advanced Research Design RM250 (Malaysian/International Corresponding Author)
3 Journal of Advanced Research in Computing and Applications RM250 (Malaysian/International Corresponding Author)

General Information

• All journals are recognized in SCOPUS/MYCITE. The final publication is subject to a rigorous quality assessment by the editorial team of the publisher.

• Papers that do not meet the criteria for the SCOPUS-indexed journal will be forwarded to the MYCITE journal for further consideration. Papers will be published in WoS/Scopus/MyCITE journals with an additional cost paid to the journal publisher.

• The selection of the journal is at the discretion of the journal publisher and not the iCSM2025 organizer.

• Author will need to follow the template provided by the selected journal.
